channel.title: Development on Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Development on Hugo Relearn Theme

item.title: Contributing
item.description: Code Quality A new release can happen at any time from the main branch of the <<<<<<< HEAD GitHub project =======GitHub project >>>>>>> upstream/main without further accknowledgment. This makes it necessary that, every pushed set of changesets into the main branch must be self-contained and correct, resulting in a releasable version. Stay simple for the user by focusing on the mantra “convention over configuration”. At installation the site should work reasonable without (m)any configuration.

item.title: Maintaining
item.description: Semver This project tries to follow the <<<<<<< HEAD semver policy =======semver policy >>>>>>> upstream/main - although not followed 100% in the past. Usually an entry of Breaking on the <<<<<<< HEAD What&rsquo;s new =======What’s new >>>>>>> upstream/main page causes a new major release number. All other entries on the <<<<<<< HEAD What&rsquo;s new =======What’s new >>>>>>> upstream/main page will increase the minor release number. Releases resulting in a new major or minor number are called main release.

item.title: Screenshots
item.description: Sometimes screenshots need to be redone. This page explains how to create the different screenshots, tools and settings Common Creation: Use English translation Empty search Remove history checkmarks but leave it on the page thats used for the screenshot After resize of the page into the required resolution, reload the page to have all scrollbars in default loading position Demo Screenshot Content: A meaningful full-screen screenshot of an interesting page.
